channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Active Directory Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Active Directory Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-23105|2024-08-03T03:36:19.191Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Directory Plugin 2.25 and earlier does not encrypt the transmission of data between the Jenkins controller and Active Directory servers in most configurations.
